short_description: 4 tickets to see Coldplay at Wembley Stadium
description: 4 excellent seated tickets to see Coldplay at Wembley Stadium, for the Coldplay show of your choice in August!
terms: Tickets can not be transferred and will be sent to an email address shortly before the event. Tickets must not be sold or transferred and only auction winner and guests may attend.

lot: 4 tickets for Brighton Women v Liverpool at the AMEX
short_description: Brighton Women are back at the AMEX to play Liverpool Women on 19th April, 12:30pm kick off.
description: Brighton Women are back at the AMEX to play Liverpool Women on 19th April, 12:30pm kick off. Go and see the Seagulls beat the reds (or the other way round if you prefer red). Either way I am sure your favourite team will win (or not).

short_description: 4 tickets to the hottest event of the year, Oasis reunion at Wembley.
description: Come on arr kid, you won't find any dynamic pricing here, just bid what you can afford and see if you're lucky enough to be the highest bidder. Unfortunately due to the nature of the auction refunds are not possible if the Gallagher brothers do fall out with each other before any othe following dates: Jul 25 Friday, Jul 26 Saturday, Jul 30 Wednesday, Aug 2 Saturday, Aug 3 Sunday, Sep 27 Saturday, Sep 28 Sunday
terms: Tickets can not be transferred and will be sent to an email address shortly before the event. Tickets must not be sold or transferred and only auction winner and guests may attend.
